Ella logro tener este negocio comprando primero lo que  con refrescos y un poco de dulces y con esas ganancias fue comprando mas y mas dulces y con la ayuda de fundacion logro comprar mas mercancía y  mas dulces y frutas para los niños.
Dice que su negocio le deja buenas ganancias y eso la hace muy feliz por que su trabajo es una de las cosas mas lindas que tiene.
Pidió el préstamo para la compra de más dulces, refrescos, jugos, sabritas, chicharrones, palomitas y frutas para la venta.
Esta muy contenta ya que fundacion le ayudado a mejorar su negocio y sus nivel de vida.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son
Ines Lourdes- se dedica a la venta de comida.
Alma Rosa- se dedica a la venta de libros.
Margarita- se dedica a la venta de libros.
Maria de Jesus – se dedica a la venta de pan.
Julia- se dedica ala venta de dulces.
Mayran Nallely- se dedica a la venta de cortinas.
Laura Catalina- se dedica a la venta de refrescos.
Maribel- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Esther- se dedica a la venta de catálogos.

Le dan las gracias a fundacion por ayudara  a todas las mujeres trabajadoras.
texts.en:
This group is called Violetas 1 and is made up of ten hardworking and humble women that make a living doing different economic activities. They are from Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca, where engraved machetes are made. Pinotepa Nacional means "towards the crumbling hill."

One of the members of the group is fifty-year-old Virginia Ines. She's a happy, humble, and very hardworking woman. Ms. Viki, as she's better known, has made a living selling sweets for four years. She tells us that she loves her job a lot because it took her a lot to grow it. She also sells ice cream treats, potato chips, soft drinks, pork cracklings, and fruit with chile. She sets up her table and merchandise, and as there is an elementary school near her home, children buy sweets from her at recess and stop by to buy sweets after school finished. She really likes to spend time with children and treat them well since they are her biggest customers and they are happy with her. She achieved having this business by first buying soft drinks and a few sweets, and with these earnings she bought more and more sweets. With the help of the foundation she achieved buying more merchandise, sweets, and fruit for the children.

She says that her business leaves her with good earnings. This makes her happy because her job is one of the nicest things she has. She requested the loan to buy more sweets, soft drinks, juice, potato chips, pork cracklings, popcorn, and fruit to sell. She is very happy that the foundation is helping her improve her business and quality of life.

The other members of the group are:

Ines Lourdes, who makes a living selling food.
Alma Rosa, who makes a living selling books.
Margarita, who makes a living selling books.
Maria de Jesus, who makes a living selling bread.
Julia, who makes a living selling sweets.
Mayran Nallely, who makes a living selling curtains.
Laura Catalina, who makes a living selling soft drinks.
Maribel, who makes a living selling clothing.
Esther, who makes a living selling catalogs.


She thanks the foundation for helping all the hardworking women.

loans.use: to buy sweets to sell.

loans.name: Martin Enrique

texts.es:
Martin, tiene 19 años de edad, vive con sus padres, tienen casa propia, él ayuda a su padre en el cultivo de maíz y crianza de ganado, ha aprendido bien lo necesario para realizar este trabajo, su hermanos tambien colaboran para poder sostenerse en el hogar.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, semilla de maíz, para sembrar en esta temporada, este préstamo les ayudara a prestar el dinero necesario para invertirlo en su cultivo, esperando tener una buena productividad.
La aspiración de Martin es salir adelante con su familia, apoyándose, realizando lo necesario para vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Martin is 19 years old and lives with his parents who own their own home.  He helps his father to grow corn and raise livestock.  He has learned everything he needs to know in order to carry out this work.  His siblings also help to support the household.

Martin is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, herbicides and corn seeds to sow this season.  The loan will help him to have the money he needs to invest in his crops.  He hopes to enjoy a good yield.

Martin's goal is to make progress, supporting his family, doing what he needs to so that they can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and corn seed

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con sus padres, tiene 23 años de edad, trabaja en el cultivo de maíz y frijol, está soltero, él aprendió su trabajo porque en su hogar su padre es agricultor, tiene 6 años de trabajar con él.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de semilla, abono y herbicidas, para iniciar la nueva siembra de esta temporada, con este préstamo contara con el dinero necesario para poder realizar la inversión y desarrollar la siembra, esperando tener una buena productividad.
El objetivo de Carlos es mejorar su economía a través del trabajo porque de esta manera le ofrecerá a su familia un ingreso más para cubrir las necesidades.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his parents, is 23 years old, and works growing corn and beans. He is single and learned his job because at home his father is a farmer and he's been working with him for six years.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and herbicide in order to begin new planting this season. With this loan he will have the necessary money to be able to make the investment and develop his planting. He hopes to have good productivity.

Carlos' objective is to improve his finances through his work because in this way he will offer his family another income to cover necessities.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides.

loans.name: Yony

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal KUKULI;la socia Yony continua con su negocio de elaboracion de artesania como muñecas que ella misma los hace para luego repartirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan como tiendas de regalos,la socia a la vez es docente ella trabaja de lunes a viernes por la mañana,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
 
La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboracion de las muñecas como hilos de colores ,telas y agujas de diferentes tamaños.

La socia se siente agradecida por el prestamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Yony belongs to the Kukuli community bank.  She continues in her business making handicrafts such as dolls.  Yony makes the items herself and then delivers them to customers, such as gift shops, who request them from her.  At the same time, Yony works as a teacher.  She works Monday to Friday, in the mornings.  She is a cheerful and responsible person who has a great desire to continue working for her family.  

Yony is requesting this loan to buy materials for making dolls such as colored threads, fabric and different-sized needles.

Yony is grateful for the loan she is receiving and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy materials for making dolls such as colored threads, fabric and different-sized needles

loans.name: Wilmer Ulises

texts.es:
Wilmer, trabaja en la agricultura, tiene 26 años de edad, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 3 y 1 años de edad, Wilmer tiene siete años de estar dedicándose a la siembra el cual lo aprendió de su padre.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de semilla de maíz, abono, herbicidas, y otros insumos, que son necesarios para aplicar a la siembra que le ayudan a proteger y prevenir de las plagas, este préstamo le ayudara a Wilmer, porque tendrá los recursos necesarios para que su cultivo sea productivo.
La aspiración de él es continuar trabajando de la mejor manera, con el objetivo de mejorar la producción en sus cultivos, para sustentar sus necesidades y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilmer works as a farmer. He's 26 years old and lives with his wife and two children of 3 years and 1 year of age. Wilmer has been making a living planting crops for seven years as his father taught him.

He is requesting a loan to buy corn seed, fertilizer, herbicides, and other supplies which are necessary to apply to the crops as they help him protect them and prevent pests. This loan will help Wilmer because he will have the necessary resources for his crop to be productive.

His aspiration is to continue working in the best way possible with the objective of improving the production of his crop. This is so that he is able to support his and his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizer, and herbicides.

loans.name: Jhon Alexander

texts.es:
Jhon tiene 23 años, es un joven muy trabajador y sobre todo con un entusiasmo y un optimismo que contagia, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad en la cual se encuentran playas hermosas y atractivos turísticos que enamoran a más de uno de los cuales son las Islas Ballestas y el Candelabro de Paracas, también se desarrolla la agricultura y la pesca. Los fines de semana o cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio, en algunas oportunidades le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo ceviche mixto con su chilcano, es una delicia; el nos comenta que solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar administración de empresas.

De sol a sol Jhon sale a trabajar en su negocio de venta de comida, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene una muy buena sazón lapa la preparación de los platillos y por ello los clientes se sienten satisfechos con lo que el ofrece.

Jhon está muy feliz y agradecido con la ayuda que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su local como pintado, tarrajeo y refacción de pequeñas rajaduras, entre otros, de esta manera tendrá un local en mejores condiciones para atender a sus clientes y sobre todo brindara una mejor atención, asimismo el podrá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y estudiar la carrera de administración”.
texts.en:
Jhon is 23 years old.  He is a very hard-working young man who has a lot of enthusiasm and a contagious level of optimism.  He lives in the city of Pisco which has beautiful beaches and tourist attractions that win over the hearts of visitors.  These attractions include the Ballestas Islands and the Candelabra of the Andes (a prehistoric geoglyph).  People in the area farm and fish.  On weekends, or whenever he has a little free time, Jhon enjoys playing football with his friends and neighbors.  He also enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes: delicious ceviche (a fish dish marinated in citrus juice) together with a glass of pisco (grape brandy).  Jhon tells us that he only completed his secondary education but he would have liked to have gone on to study for a degree in business.

From morning til night, Jhon works in his business selling food.  He works around 10 hours a day and can serve up to 40 customers.  He believes that his business is doing well because the dishes he prepares are very tasty and so his customers are happy with what he sells.

Jhon is very happy and grateful to receive the help that Kiva lenders have offered him.  Thanks to their help, he will be able to make some improvements to his premises, painting, tiling and plastering over some small cracks.  This will improve the condition of the premises in which he serves his customers and he will be able to provide a better service.  He will also be able to continue working hard so that he can accomplish his biggest dream: to own his own home and study for a business degree.

loans.use: to improve his premises (painting, tiling, plastering cracks, etc.)

loans.name: Maritza Elizabeth

texts.es:
Maritza, se dedica a la venta de medicinas y granos básicos, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, uno de ellos esta estudiando, Maritza tiene 5 años en el negocio, lo aprendió con sus padres, tambien vende granos básicos, con esta ocupación ha logrado ayudar a su esposo por varios años.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, frijoles, clorofila, omega, psylium en polvo y cascara sagrada, todos estos productos son los que ofrece en el negocio,  ayudándole a incrementar su inventario y poder mejorar sus ventas.
La aspiración de Maritza es fortalecer aun más el negocio,  ya que así estará asegurándose un mejor futuro con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maritza's business is selling natural medicines and basic grains.  She lives with her husband and her two children, one of whom is in school.  Maritza has been in her business for five years.  She learned it from her parents.  She also sells basic grains.  Through her work, she has managed to help her husband for several years.

Maritza is requesting a loan to buy corn, beans, chlorophyll, omega, powdered psyllium and sacred bark (rhamnus purshiana).  These are all products that she sells in her business and so this will help her to increase her stock and improve her sales.

Maritza's goal is to further strengthen her business as it will allow her to guarantee a good future for herself and her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, chlorophyll, omega, powdered psyllium and sacred bark (rhamnus purshiana)

loans.name: Nyakagezi / Zz Group

texts.fr:
Thémistocle fait partie du groupe Nyakagezi /Zz. Le nom du groupe signifie «Name of the valley ». Il a 28  ans, il est célibataire. Il a  1 personne dans son charge .Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de secondaire.
Thémistocle est agriculteur de riz. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.
Pour faire croitre son agriculture, il planifie de cultiver d’une façon moderne. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait acheter d’autres champs pour agrandir son agriculture. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’acheter un véhicule qui va l’aide à faire son business, construire une maison pour sa famille et payer les frais scolaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Thémistocle is a member of the Nyakagezi /Zz group.The group’s name means « Name of the valley ».He is 28 and single. He has one person dependent on him. His education level is 6th secondary.
Thémistocle is a rice farmer. This is his second loan from ABC. He will use his credit to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labour.
To expand his exploitation, he plans to use modern methods of cultivation. Over the coming years he would like to purchase more fields to enlarge his farm. With the profits he plans to buy a vehicle which will help him to go about his business, build a house for his family, and pay his children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labour.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es: Luis Antonio de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia en zona rural; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, lleva varios años de dedicarse al ámbito de la agricultura, se siente orgulloso pues esto le ha regalado valiosa experiencia para mejorar en sus siembras y obtener las mejores cosechas; se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija ya que lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente siempre está a la orden de las personas que lo solicitan; Luis es un hombre dedicado a su labor, humilde y muy agradecido, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades para así en un futuro cercano obtener el éxito que toda persona desea, ahora que quiere aumentar la producción en las cosechas necesita de capital para invertir, por eso se ha decidido solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizantes, insecticida y herramienta. Luis Antonio es responsable y tiene la confianza que con las ganancias obtenidas podrá cancelar el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Luis Antonio, age 46, lives with his life companion and their two children in their home in a rural area. He cultivates corn and sorghum and has been working in an agricultural setting for several years. Luis is proud that he has gained valuable experience, which has helped to improve his crops and resulted in better harvests. He has many established customers already because what he sells is of good quality and sold at affordable prices. In addition, his service is excellent since he is always fulfilling the requests of the people who order from him.

Luis is a man who is dedicated to his work, humble, and very appreciative. He is always expecting new opportunities in the near future to achieve the success that every person desires. Now he wants to increase his crop production, but he needs capital to invest. For this reason, he has decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral which will allow him to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, insecticides, and tools. Luis Antonio is responsible and confident that the profit he earns will enable him to repay the loan. At the same, he will be able to provide a full life for his family.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, insecticides, and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, shorts and sandals

loans.name: Virginia Jeannette

texts.es:
Virginia, vive con sus tres hijos y su esposo, administra una panadería, con su familia trabajan en la elaboración del pan, este negocio comenzó gracias al apoyo de su familia, trabajan en la vivienda, no tienen un horario establecido.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina, azúcar, huevos, levadura, entre otros que son necesarios para realizar la producción, este préstamo le servirá para realizar la inversión y contar con los materiales necesarios en la panadería.
El objetivo de Virginia es crecer, aumentando el número de clientes, y ofreciendo a su familia una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Virginia lives with her husband and three children.  She runs a bakery and works together with her family, baking bread.  She started this business with the support of her family.  They work at home and do not work regular hours.

Virginia is requesting a loan to buy flour, sugar, eggs, yeast and other products that she needs to make her products.  This loan will allow her to make the investment and have available the materials she needs for her bakery.

Virginia's goals are to grow her business, increase her number of customers, and offer her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs and yeast

loans.name: Xiomara Yeskeli

texts.es:
Xiomara, administra una tienda, quiere seguir invirtiendo porque considera que estos préstamos le ayudan para seguir mejorando y creciendo en lo económico, por eso invertirá en la compra de boquitas, jugos, dulces, bombones, jugos y gaseosas, su intención es seguir creciendo.
Ella considera que este préstamo le ayudo a mejorar el servicio a su clientela, aumentando sus ingresos y  la condición en su familia ha sido mejor.
texts.en:
Xiomara runs a store.  She would like to continue investing in it because she believes that these loans help her to continue improving and growing on a financial level.  She will invest in buying snacks, juice, sweet treats, candies and soda.  Her intention is to continue growing her business.

Xiomara believes that her previous loan helped her to improve her service to her customers, increased her income, and improved her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy snacks, juice, sweet treats, candies and soda

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
Rita pertenece al banco comunal “Kukuli” ,la socia continua trabajando en su negocio de elaboracion de artesania como tejidos y muñequeria ,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le vabien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia realiza sus trabajos para luego repartirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio como telas e hilos de diferente color.

La socia agradece el prestamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Rita belongs to the Kukuli community bank.  She continues in her business making dolls and knitted products.  She has been in this business for a long time and things are going well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.  Rita makes her products and then delivers them to customers who request them.  This is how she makes progress together with her family.

Rita is requesting this loan to buy materials for her business such as fabric and different-colored threads.

Rita is grateful for the loan that she has been given and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business such as fabric and different-colored thread

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo de 33 años de edad, es casado y tiene 2 hijos de 3, y 7 años de edad, vive con su familia en una aldea del municipio de Morazan, Yoro.
Ricardo recibió por herencia un terreno, y desde hace 3 años comenzó a realizar sus propios cultivos de maíz. Este producto que cosecha lo vende a intermediarios que llegan a la zona a comprarlo. Esta solicitando un préstamo a ODEF por 6,000.00 Lempiras para darle un buen mantenimiento a la tierra donde va cultivar el maíz, comprara fertilizantes y pago de limpieza. Con esta inversión espera sacar mejores cosechas las que le permitirán obtener más ingresos. Su plan para la próxima cosecha es ampliar el área de cultivo y buscar mejores compradores para su producto.
Ricardo pertenece a un grupo solidario llamado Bendicion del señor y esta formado por tres miembros mas que vievn en la misma comunidad.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 33 years old, married, and has two children (ages 3 and 7). He lives with his family in a neighborhood in the town of Morazan, Yoro.

Ricardo inherited a piece of land and began growing his own corn crops three years ago. The products that he harvests are sold to brokers who come to the area looking to buy. He is requesting a loan from ODEF in the amount of 6,000 HNL so that he can maintain his land for growing corn. Ricardo will buy fertilizers and pay to have his land cleared. With this investment, he hopes to achieve better yields that will allow him to generate more income. His plan for the next harvest is to expand the area that he cultivates and to find better buyers for his product. Ricardo belongs to a solidarity group called "Bendicion del Señor" (The Lord's Blessing), which was formed with three other members who live in the same community.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay to have his land cleared.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sorbets, sticks and frozen chocolate bananas

loans.name: Qorichuspa Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Qorichuspa” en la asociación pro vivienda Habitad Hillary del distrito de Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de artesanía, venta de comestibles, venta de ropa, venta de granos secos,  venta de leña y otros trabajan como profesoras, maestro de obras y empleado público. 
 
(La señora Ruth está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia Ruth nació en  la ciudad de Lima pero desde hace 7 años que vive en la ciudad de Urubamba, ella tiene 45 años edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos (Estefany 22 años de edad y estudia en una universidad nacional, Antony 18 años de edad y estudia en una  universidad particular y Leo de 14 años de edad que estudia en el colegio). Su actividad económica principal de Ruth es la venta de balones de Gas, ella tiene un pequeño local en su domicilio. Ya son 7 años se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. La socia Ruth también se dedica  a la preparación de comida en fiestas patronales. Su esposo de Ruth es albañil por lo tanto se dedica a  la construcción de casas. Ruth en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar una maquina sierra circular para cortar madera que servirá para agilizar el trabajo del esposo.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Los socios que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía pidieron permiso a la junta directiva del banco comunal para no estar presentes en la reunión). 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends formed the communal bank "Qorichuspa" in the pro-housing association Habitad Hillary from the district and province of Urubamba of the department of Cusco. This communal bank is made up of people that look for opportunities to get ahead at each moment and give a better future to their children with their daily effort. The members' economic activities, for example, are: selling traditional crafts, food, clothing, dry grains, and wood, and others work as teachers, master builders, and public workers.

(Ruth is raising her hand in the photograph.) The member Ruth was born in the city of Lima but has lived in the city of Urubamba for seven years. She is 45 years old and has a common law marriage from which she has three children (Estefany, 22 years of age who studies at a national university; Antony, 18 years of age who studies at a private university; and Leo, 14 years years of age who is in high school). Ruth's main economic activity is selling cylinders of gas and she has a small shop in her home. She has already been making a living doing this business for seven years and things are going very well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into it. The member Ruth also makes a living making food for patron saint's day parties. Her husband is a building worker and as such makes a living building houses. At this time Ruth needs the loan to buy a circular machine saw to cut wood which will allow her husband to speed up his work.

On the whole the members are thankful for the opportunity given to them and commit themselves to fulfilling the payments of their different installments according to the established terms. (The members that appear in the lower part of the photograph asked for permission from the communal bank's directive committee to not be present at the meeting.)

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco of the department of Cusco in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas. It is characterized for being a touristy area due to its archaeological and historic centers, landscapes, and history, and because it's a charming city in the southern region of the country. Cusco is known for being a very touristy area, for its traditional celebration Inti Raymi, and because one of the seven wonders of the world "Machu Picchu" is located nearby.

loans.use: to buy a circular machine saw.

loans.name: Flor De Amaranto Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Flor de Amaranto, está conformado por la señoras Senorina, Francisca Faustina, Diana Ivonne y el señor Alejandro van a comprar con su préstamo harina, aceite, pintura, bolsa, cinta, la señora Filadelfa Sabina va a comprar Obleas y bolsa. La señora Francisca Faustina tiene 53 años de edad, ella es separada, ella tiene 10 hijos, 4 mujeres y 6 varones solo estudian 2 varones uno en la secundaria y el otro en el CBTA, ella elabora Obleas para su venta, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar harina, pintura, aceite, cinta canela y bolsas para surtirse de la materia prima y tener para ir trabajando, ella está feliz con el préstamo que va a recibir se va a surtir de materia prima para tener almacenado e ir trabajando la oblea. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les damos las gracias por sus préstamos gracias a ustedes vamos saliendo adelante con los negocios y que nos sigan ayudando con sus préstamos.  Ella inicio su negocio hace 5 años viendo como elaboraban las obleas y echando a perder la primera producción ya que no querían salir las obleas, su negocio es importante porque le va bien en la venta de obles y tiene ingresos para la comida y para los gastos de sus hijos que estan estudiando, ella se siente orgullosa de tener su negocio ya es conocido por sus clientes vienen por las obleas hasta su casa. Sus sueños y esperanzas son salir adelante y progresar construir su taller y lo mejor para sus hijos que estudien una carrera y tengan un buen trabajo.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Flor de Amaranto'.   Senorina, Francisca Faustina, Diana Ivonne and Alejandro will use their loan to buy flour, oil, paint, bags and ribbon.  Fidelfa Sabina will buy wafers and bags.

Francisca Faustina is 53 years old, separated, and has ten children: four daughters and six sons.  Only two of her sons are currently in school: one is in high school and the other attends a CBTA (agriculture-based educational institution).  Francisca Faustina makes and sells wafers.  She requested this loan to buy flour, paint, oil, ribbon, cinnamon and bags so that she can stock up with raw materials and have enough to continue working with.  She is happy with the loan that she will receive as she will stock up with raw materials and have enough stored up so that she can continue making her wafers.  The members of this group would like to say to Kiva and Fundación Realidad: "Thank you for the loans.  Thanks to you, we are making progress in our businesses.  Please keep helping us with your loans.  

Francisca Faustina started her business five years ago as she watched and learned how to make wafers.  Her first lot of wafers were spoiled as they didn't want to come out.  Her business is important because she does well selling wafers.  She makes enough income to pay for food and cover the expenses of her children who are still in school.  She feels proud having her own business.  She is well known by her customers who come to her house to buy her wafers.  Her hopes and dreams are to get ahead in life and to build a workshop.  She also wants the best for her children.  She would like them to study for a degree and find good jobs.

loans.use: to buy flour, paint, oil, ribbon, cinnamon and bags for making wafers

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teófila, se ha decidido por un préstamo, porque necesita invertir en el negocio de ropa, comprándose más estilos nuevos en blusas, calzonetas, ropa interior, para ambos sexos, su objetivo con la compra es mantener el negocio bien surtido pues esto le ayudara a mantener tambien la fidelidad en los clientes.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior  aumento el inventario y que su clientela le adquirió muchas prendas de vestir, dándole la oportunidad económica para cancelar las cuotas y cubrir sus gastos, sus condiciones han mejorado a través de la utilización de este préstamo.
texts.en:
Teófila has decided to take out a loan because she needs to invest in her clothing business, buying more new styles of blouses and both men's and women's underwear.  She plans to make this purchase because she wants to keep her business well stocked.  This will help her to maintain her customers' loyalty.

Teófila believes that her previous loan helped her to increase her stock and her customers were able to buy many items of clothing.  This enabled her to make her loan repayments and cover her expenses.  Her living conditions also improved.

loans.use: to buy blouses and both men's and women's underwear

loans.name: Montototalnocoincide Santo Domingo Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Santo Domingo ya que así se llama el barrio en donde está formado; se integra de tres señoras con distinta actividad.
Rosalinda está casada con el señor José Arquímedes desde hace treinta años con quien procreó cinco hijos dos de los cuales ya están casados y tres quienes aún están bajo su responsabilidad.
Ella solicitó el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de panes, actividad en la cual lleva trabajando diez años y afortunadamente comenta que le va bien ya que obtiene ingresos para apoyar a sus hijos que están estudiando.
Se inspiró en esta actividad para apoyar a su esposo y así juntos tener lo más necesario para sus ingresos en la panadería. Rosalinda trabaja dos veces a la semana y cuando tiene encargo, los cinco días de la semana para así darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Lo que desea es poder seguir trabajando y con el préstamo apoyarse para comprar lo que necesita para la elaboración de los panes.
Las personas que integran en el grupo son: Araley, quien invertirá el préstamo en la compra de zapatos de la marca Mega Shoes; y la señora Normaida, quien invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de tamales.
texts.en:
This group is called Santo Domingo as it is the name of the neighborhood in which the group is located.  The three ladies in this group each have different businesses.  

Rosalinda has been married to José Arquímedes for thirty years.  The couple have five children, two of whom are already married and three of whom are still their responsibility.

Rosalinda requested this loan to invest in buying ingredients for making bread.  She has been working in this business for ten years and, fortunately, she says that things are going well as she makes the income she needs to support her children who are studying.

Rosalinda decided to set up this business in order to support her husband.  She works twice a week and, when she has orders, she works five days a week so that she can provide her customers with a better service.

What Rosalinda would like is to continue working and to use this loan to buy what she needs for making her bread.

The other members of this group are Araley who will invest her loan in buying Mega Shoes brand shoes and Normaida who will invest in buying ingredients for making tamales.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making bread

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, solicita un préstamo por la necesidad de sembrar su cultivo agrícola, como abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, esto le ayudara a brindarle lo necesario para la ejecución de sus labores y poder seguir trabajando.
El considera que con el préstamo anterior logro realizar su trabajo, obteniendo una buena cosecha, que tambien beneficio a su familia, pues contaron con granos básicos para la alimentación y para vender y generar ingresos.
texts.en:
Victor is applying for a loan to buy supplies for his farming business: fertilizer, insecticides, etc.  He will use the supplies he buys with the loan to continue his business.
He tells us, too, that past loans helped him bring in a good harvest, something that is important to his family because they can sell whatever surplus they don't need to live to generate a cash income.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Rosario Fernanda

texts.es:
Rosario es una joven muy entusiasta, es madre de un pequeño de 2 años al cual quiere mucho y sobre todo porque es el regalo más grande que Dios le ha dado y por el cual trabaja mucho y se esfuerza para darle una vida de calidad y sobre todo con amor y mucho cariño. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, paprika, uva, esparrago. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Enfermería.

Con mucho entusiasmo Rosario trabaja en su negocio de venta de refrescos, bebidas gaseosas y golosinas, todos los días Rosario trabaja alrededor de 8 horas y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es  muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque se encuentra en una buena ubicación.

Rosarios está muy agradecida y feliz con la ayuda brindada por los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a este apoyo ella podrá realizar unas mejoras  su local como pintado de paredes, mejoramiento de instalaciones eléctricas, entre otros, de esta manera podrá tener un local mas cómodo para los clientes y sobre todo en buenas condiciones, así ella podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Rosario is a very enthusiastic young woman.  She has a 2-year-old son who she loves very much.  He is the biggest gift that God has given her and she works hard so that she can provide him with a good quality of life and, above all, love and a lot of affection.  Rosario's house is located in the city of Ica.  This city is known for its warm and welcoming climate.  It is also known for its agriculture, in particular its production of cotton, paprika, grapes and asparagus.  Owing to the limited financial resources of her parents, Rosario was only able to study to high school level.  She would have liked to have gone on to study nursing.

Rosario works very enthusiastically in her business selling soft drinks, soda and candies.  She works around 8 hours a day and can serve up to 40 customers a day.  She believes that her business is doing well because she is kind to all her customers and, above all, her business is in a good location.

Rosario is very happy and grateful for the help that she is being given by Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, she will be able to make some improvements to her premises, painting walls, improving the electrics, etc.  This will improve the condition of her premises and make them more comfortable for her customers.  As a result, she will be able to improve her income and continue working hard so that she can fulfill her biggest dream: to own her own home.

loans.use: to improve her premises (painting walls, improving the electrics, etc.)

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo porque quiere seguir mejorando en el negocio a través de las inversiones en la compra de concentrado, vitaminas y ampliar la granja, esto le ayudara a tener en mejores condiciones las gallinas, con sus medicamentos y el alimento necesario.
Ella tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, le permitió mejorar la granja y ha tenido mejores ingresos, las condiciones en su familia han cambiado, viviendo mejor que antes.
texts.en:
Magdalena has decided to request a new loan because she would like to continue improving her business.  She will do this by investing in concentrated feed and vitamins, and expanding her farm.  This will help her to keep her hens in better conditions, with the medicines and feed they need.

Magdalena's previous loan had a positive effect.  It allowed her to improve her farm and she made better income.  Her family now live in better conditions than they did before.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and vitamins, and to expand her farm

loans.name: San Jeronimo Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama San Jerónimo está conformado por: Fabiola va a comprar con su préstamo catálogos de zapatos, huaraches y zapatilla, la señora Blanca Estela va a comprar materia prima harina, grenetina, vasos para elaborar gelatinas y pasteles, la joven Aracely va a comprar pantalones, playeras, blusas, la señora Cecilia va a comprar chicles, pelones, paletas y totis. La joven Aracely tiene 21 años de edad, ella es casada su esposo es soldado, ella tiene una hija de 2 meses de edad, ella vende ropa, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar pantalones, playeras, camisas, suéter de dama y caballero, ella inicio su negocio hace 8 meses se la traspaso su cuñada, su negocio es importante porque le deja ganancias, ella está planeando meter ropa de bebe, de niña y niño y lo piensa lograr con el préstamo que va a recibir. Sus sueños y esperanzas son que su tienda de ropa crezca, que su hija este bien de salud y siga creciendo. Ella está feliz con el préstamo que va a recibir tiene la oportunidad de crecer y surtir su tienda de ropa. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les damos las gracias por sus préstamos que nos dan, es una gran ayuda de hacer crecer los negocios y vivir mejor con las familias”.
texts.en: Members of the San Jeronimo community bank include: Fabiola who will use her loan to stock her retail business with shoes, etc.; Sra. Blanca Estela who will use her loan to buy supplies for her food business; Aracela will use her loan to stock her clothing business; and Cecilia who will use her loan to stock her retail business with gum and other snacks.  Aracela, 21, and her husband, a soldier, have a two-month old daughter.  She sells clothing and is applying for a loan to buy pants, shirts, sweaters, etc.  She started the business 8 months ago with help from her sister-in-law.  The business is important to her because it generates extra income.  She wants to stock baby clothes in the future and is thinking of using her share of the loan for that purpose.  Her hopes for the future are that her daughter continue to thrive and that her business continue to grow.  She is grateful for past loans because they helped her to establish her business and grow it.  The members of the community bank want Kiva lenders and Fundacion Realidad know "that we are grateful for your loan . . . it will greatly help us to grow our businesses and improve the lives of our families".

loans.use: to stock her retail business.

loans.name: Inmaculada Concepcion De Qosqo Ayllu Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Inmaculada Concepcion de Qosqo Ayllu” en la comunidad de Qosqo  Ayllu del distrito de San Salvador de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de jora, venta de comestibles, venta de comida, venta de granos secos, venta de cerveza, venta de yeso,  crianza de animales menores, otros trabajan en la agricultura y brindan servicio de transportes. 
 
(La señora María del Carmen está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia María del Carmen nació en  la ciudad de Lima pero desde muy niña sus padres llevaron a vivir en la comunidad de Qosqo Ayllu. Actualmente, Maria del Carmen tiene 36 años edad, es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal de la socia María del Carmen es la venta productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite y otras cosas más, ella también se dedica a la agricultura y siembra kiwicha, maíz, cebada  y otras cosas más. Ya son 8 años se dedica a este negocio de venta de comestibles y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. María del Carmen en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por  ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, pescado, pollo y otras cosas más, ella viaja dos veces a la semana a la ciudad del Cusco a comprar sus productos. Su sueño de María del Carmen es ampliar su local, abrir un depósito de cerveza, comprar una computadora y una fotocopiadora.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors formed the 'Inmaculada Concepcion de Qosqo Ayllu' community bank in Qosqo Ayllu, a community in San Salvador district, Calca province, Cusco department.  The members of this bank are always looking for opportunities to make progress in life and, through their daily work, they hope to provide their children with a better future.  The members' business activities include: selling 'jora' (a traditional drink), selling groceries, selling food, selling dried grains, selling beer, selling plaster and raising animals.  Others work in agriculture and provide transport services.

María del Carmen is the lady who is raising her hand in the photo.  She was born in the city of Lima but her parents took her to live in Qosqo Ayllu community when she was very young.  She is currently 36 years old, married, and has two children from this beautiful relationship.  Her main business activity is selling basic household products such as rice, sugar, noodles and oil.  She also grows amaranth, corn, barley and other products.  She has been selling groceries for eight years and her business is doing very well thanks to the hard work that she puts in. On this occasion, María del Carmen needs a loan to buy merchandise such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, noodles, fish, chicken, etc.  She travels twice a week to the city of Cusco to buy her products.  Her dreams are to expand her premises, open a beer warehouse, and to buy a computer and photocopier.

The members of this group are grateful for the opportunity they are being given and they pledge to make their loan repayments on time.

The city of Cusco is located in the district, province and department of Cusco, in the very heart of the ancient city of the Incas.  It is a tourist area owing to its archaeological centers, its historic center, its landscape and its history.  Cusco is well known as a tourist spot.  It is also known for its commerce, its traditional Inti Raymi celebrations and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world (Machu Picchu).

loans.use: to buy merchandise (bags of rice, bags of sugar, noodles, fish, chicken, etc.)

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es:
El señor cecilio trabaja para una empresa transportista como operador desde hace tresce años, su esposa se dedica a las labores del hogar, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad que estan estudiando la universidad. 
Él señor cecilio tiene tiempo arreglando su casa, ahora solo falta arreglar el piso con  material de vitropiso para mayor comodidad en cuartos , galeria, pasillos; enjarre de paredes y pintura de la casa.
texts.en:
Cecilio has been working for a freight company as an operator for thirteen years. His spouse is a housewife. He has two adult children who are university students.

Cecilio has been fixing up his house. Now he only needs to do the floor using ceramic tile in order to make the rooms, corridor and hallways more comfortable; he will plaster the walls and paint the house.

loans.use: to place ceramic tiles in the corridor, rooms, and hallways and to plaster the walls and paint the house

loans.name: Un Nuevo Resplandor Group

texts.es: Feliciana tiene 38 años de edad, ella está casada con Saúl el cual es albañil y tiene 3 hijas de nombres Berenice estudiante de secundaria, Marlene estudiante de primaria y la pequeña Guadalupe. Platica que se dedica a la compra y venta de magueyes para sacar el aguamiel (bebida no alcohólica) comenta doña Feliciana que su suegra fue que le enseño a raspar los magueyes para extraer la bebida, ella lo vende en la población de Zitacuaro por litro y tiene con este tipo de negocio aproximadamente 5 años y dice que es muy buen negocio. Comenta que está pidiendo un crédito para la compra de magueyes y también dice que hace costuras como servilletas, almohadones, manteles etc. Dice que las costuras las vende en la ciudad de México y que se va dos veces por mes ya que se lleva varias costuras. Doña Feliciana está muy agradecida con la financiera por este apoyo que le están haciendo porque así podrá hacer crecer su negocio. La meta que tiene es hacer otro negocio de cría y venta de borregos para así poder crecer un poco más su negocio y tener más ganancias para apoyar a sus hijos con la escuela. Las otras seis integrantes del grupo se llaman Arnulfa, Maria Marcela, Maria Magdalena, Griselda, Consuelo y Pascacia ellas invertirán su crédito en material para hacer bordados artesanales, para la compra de artículos para una tienda de abarrotes, compra y venta de borregos.
texts.en:
Feliciana is 38 years old.  She is married to Saúl, who is a builder, and has three daughters: Berenice (a high school student), Marlene (an elementary school student) and little Guadalupe.  Feliciana tells us that she buys maguey cacti so that she can extract 'aguamiel' (a non-alcoholic drink).  She tells us that it was her mother-in-law who taught her how to scrape the maguey cactus in order to extract the drink.  She sells her 'aguamiel' in the town of Zitacuaro by the liter.  She has been in this business for approximately five years and says that it is a very good business.  She says that she is requesting a loan to buy maguey catci.  She also sews napkins, pillowcases, tablecloths etc.  She tells us that she sells the products that she sews in Mexico city where she travels twice a month.  Feliciana is very grateful to the financial institution for the support that they are giving her because it will enable her to grow her business.  Her goal is to start another business raising and selling lambs so that she can grow a little more in her activities and make more profits so that she can support her children in their education.

The other six members of this group are Arnulfa, Maria Marcela, Maria Magdalena, Griselda, Consuelo and Pascacia.  They will invest their loans in buying materials for making embroidered products, buying products for a grocery store and buying lambs to sell.

loans.use: to buy maguey cacti so that she can sell 'aguamiel'

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas is 38 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She operates a local cafe in the town of Malindi, and she has been in the business for the last three years. She earns a monthly profit of 15,000 KES. 

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our credit officers, and she is applying for her first loan of 30,000 KES. She intends to use the loan to buy plates, water glasses, serving trays, water jugs, and spoons as well as foodstuffs needed for her business. 

She will save the anticipated profit and help take care of her children. In the future, Dorcas hopes to grow her cafe and make it a well-known hotel (restaurant) in the area so that she can improve her financial stability.

loans.use: to  buy plates, water glasses, serving trays, water jugs, eating spoons, and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en: Rehema is taking out a new loan of KES 45,000 to expand her existing business. She plans to purchase fruits and vegetables to sell. She is so grateful to Kiva and Yehu for her previous loan because it helped her to increase her monthly income. She can now pay school fees to her only child, who is now enrolled in school.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 39 years old, married, and blessed with four children, aged 16, 10, seven and three years.  She has a tailoring shop where she also stocks ready-made clothes and shoes. She started this business two years ago. 

She has requested her second loan, in the amount of KES 60,000, to purchase clothing materials and lady’s skirt suits. The profit she earns will be reinvested in her business. She hopes to buy more of her stocks in Uganda soon.

loans.use: To purchase clothing materials and ladies' skirt suits to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, bath soap, detergents, and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase materials for renovating some rooms in her rental houses.

loans.name: Jorge Marcial

texts.es: Jorge Marcial este emprendedor es casado con un hijo menor de edad, el inicio su actividad económica con un poco de capital de propio, capital que ha venido trabajando, desde hace cuatro años que inicio con dicha herramienta de trabajo. en la actualidad Jorge ha demostrado que tiene  ganas de superación tanto en lo personal como en lo económico , se le ha visto responsabilidad, dedicación, tenacidad, por superar y mejorar su negocio, el préstamo lo está solicitando para la comprar mercadería en general que es lo que le ofrece a sus clientes como: pantalones. Camisas, short, camisolas, camisetas, zapatos, y demás productos.
texts.en: This entrepreneur, Jorge Marcial, is married with one young child.  He started his business with a small amount of his own capital and has been working with this start-up capital for four years.  Jorge has demonstrated a desire to excel in his personal life as much as in his business.  He has been responsible, dedicated, and tenacious in his desire to succeed and improve his business.  He is requesting the loan to purchase general merchandise such as trousers, shirts, shorts, camisoles, T-shirts, shoes, and other products to offer his customers.

loans.use: to purchase trousers, shirts, shorts, camisoles, T-shirts, shoes, and other products.

loans.name: Majestad (Flat) Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama  Majestad y está integrado por tres señoras quienes viven en Luis Espinoza, lugar que está a una hora de Tecpatan.

   A quien se le tomo la entre vista se llama Marlene, madre soltera con dos hijos a su responsabilidad y que estudian en secundaria.

   Marlene solicito el préstamo para invertirlo  en la compra de mercancía para surtir su negocio de abarrotes en donde lleva trabajando dos años y le va muy bien ya que está viendo ganancias con las que de nuevo compra las cosas que se le terminan.

   Inició con esta actividad para apoyarse ya que es una mujer sola que es dependiente de sí misma, y desea darle lo más necesario a sus hijos que están estudiando, a si también  generar sus propios ingresos  para  su hogar.

   Lo que desea es que con esta pequeña actividad ella siga trabajando y con el préstamo aumentar cada día más la compra de mercancía y así tener surtida su tienda de abarrotes.

   Quienes integran en el grupo son: Rosalia quien invertirá en la compra y venta de pollos de granja para venderlo destazado, la señora Ocabeth invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para elaboración de embutidos y la señora Jacinta invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de comida.
texts.en:
This group is called Majestad (Majesty) and was formed by the three ladies living in Luis Espinoza, a place that is an hour from Tecpatan.

We will be speaking of Marlene, a single mother with two children in her care who are high school students.

Marlene is asking for a loan in order to invest in the purchase of merchandise in order to supply her grocery store where she has been working for two years and it is going very well and she is seeing earnings with which she can buy the items she runs out of. 

She began this business in order to help her as a single woman who depends upon herself, and she wants to give the necessities to her children who are studying, and to pay the household expenses.

What she hopes is that with this little business she can continue working and with the loan to increase each day the inventory and thus to have a well supplied grocery store.

Those included in the group are: Rosalie who will buy and sell chickens to be butchered, Ocabeth who will buy the ingredients to make sausages, and Jacinta who will be buying ingredients for meal preparation.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to supply her grocery store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo con el objetivo de mejorar el negocio y surtir de zapatos nuevos, para salir a vender, también comprara materiales de costura como hilo, telas, botones, broches, y todo lo más necesario para poder  confeccionar las prendas de vestir.
Ella manifiesta que con el préstamo anterior logro fortalecer el negocio, ya que con este recurso aumento la variedad de mercaderia, para seguir atendiendo bien a la clientela.
texts.en:
María is requesting another loan, with the goal of improving her business and stocking up on new shoes to go out and sell.  She also will buy sewing materials such as thread, fabric, buttons, clasps, and everything necessary to be able to make clothes.

She says that with the previous loan she managed to strengthen the business, because with this resource she increased her variety of merchandise to continue serving her customers well.

loans.use: to buy new shoes and sewing materials such as thread, fabric, buttons, and clasps.

loans.name: Jose Vitelio

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo pues está iniciando la siembra de maíz, para esto necesita comprarse los materiales como el abono, insecticidas, pesticidas  que le ayudan a proteger y a desarrollar mejor el cultivo. 
Él considera que con estos préstamos le han permitido mejorar su trabajo en la agricultura, dándole los recursos económicos para cubrir el gasto de materiales, con el cultivo anterior tuvo una buena experiencia pues su cosecha fue abundante.
texts.en:
José decided on another loan because he is starting to plant corn.  For this he needs to buy supplies such as fertilizer, insecticide, and pesticide, which allow him to protect and better grow the corn.

He considers that these loans have allowed him to improve his job in agriculture, giving him the economic resources to cover the expense of the materials.  With the previous crop he had a good experience because his harvest was abundant.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and pesticide.

loans.name: Carlos Ernesto

texts.es: Carlos Ernesto de treinta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace ya mucho tiempo, cultiva especialmente maíz y frijol, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia y obtiene el mejor producto de cada cosecha, está feliz porque ha aumentado su clientela gracias al producto de calidad y a los precios accesibles que les ofrece a la hora de venderlos, además de un buen servicio y peso exacto; Carlos es un hombre trabajador, activo pero sobre todo optimista, el sabe que en un futuro con su esfuerzo y perseverancia podrá alcanzar el éxito, quiere expandir las zonas de comercio pero para eso necesita invertir más en la producción y necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol por mayor, fertilizantes y controles de plaga. Carlos Ernesto tiene muy buena experiencia crediticia, los financiamientos que ha manejado han sido pagados con puntualidad, es por eso que tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y al mismo tiempo podrá otorgarle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Carlos Ernesto is 32 years old and lives with his life companion and their children. He has engaged in agriculture for many years, especially the cultivation of corn and beans. Carlos has gained plenty of experience, which enables him to achieve a better product with each harvest. He is happy because he has increased his customer base thanks to the quality of his products and the affordable prices that he offers at the time he sells them. In addition, he provides good service and exact weights.

Carlos is a man who is hardworking, active, but most of all, optimistic. He knows that he can achieve success in the future through effort and perseverance. Carlos wants to expand his sales territory, but he needs additional capital so that he can invest more in production. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral so that he can buy corn and bean seeds in bulk, fertilizers, and pesticides. Carlos Ernesto has good credit experience. The loans he has managed have been repaid on time. This is why he is certain that he can repay this debt in the established time frame. At the same time, he will be able to provide his family with the quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds in bulk, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a single lady who sells clothes from her home and dreams of opening a boutique in the future. She has been in this business for the past seven years, selling to local residents. The high cost of commodities is her major challenge. She identifies food as her greatest monthly expense. Jane owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her aim in joining Yehu was to get loans to expand her business.

With the loan, Jane intends to purchase bundles of clothes to sell.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Adan

texts.es:
José, solicita un nuevo préstamo para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, con estos recursos comprara los materiales para aplicarlos a la siembra como es el abono, semilla de maíz, pesticidas, esto le dará la seguridad de mejorar la producción y tener sanas cosechas.
El considera haber tenido un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior,  ya que de la cosecha que obtuvo aumentaron sus ganancias, su condición familiar ha mejorado.
texts.en:
José is asking for a new loan for the cultivation of corn and beans. With these resources he will buy supplies in order to use them when planting such as fertilizer, maize seed, and pesticides to give him the security of improving his production and to have a healthy harvest. 

He believes the previous loan had a positive effect since the harvest increased his earnings and his family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, maize seed, and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, snacks, and ready-to-wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feeds for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of feeds for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of animal feed for pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for pigs

loans.name: Mwanamwinyi

texts.en: Mwanamwinyi is taking out another loan to expand the existing food selling business. Her business has grown and her monthly income has increased. Mwanamwinyi intends to purchase wheat and maize flour, sugar, rice, and cooking fat oil. Her family's health is good.

loans.use: to purchase wheat and maize flour, sugar, rice, and cooking fat oil.

loans.name: 01.07.6 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Sơn operates a food stall/restaurant selling pig intestines. Sơn has been involved in this business for 5 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell. This is Sơn's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

Sơn is 64 years old and she is married with 3 children. Sơn lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province, her children are grown up.

With her business profit, Sơn hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo pues está iniciando un nuevo cultivo de maíz, para ello deberá comprarse los materiales necesarios como el abono, herbicidas, foliares, que son los necesarios para prevenir y fortalecer la plantación.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo aumentando la producción de granos básicos, en su familia sus condiciones han mejorado también, pues ha contado con el alimento necesario y también ha obtenido ganancias.
texts.en:
María is requesting another loan because she is starting a new corn crop.  For this she needs to buy the necessary materials, such as fertilizer, herbicide, and foliar fertilizer, which are necessary to take precautions and strengthen the crop.

The effect of the previous loan was positive, having increased the production of basic grains.  Her family's living conditions have improved too, because she has had the necessary food and profits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and foliar fertilizer.

loans.name: El Aguacate Group

texts.es: Doña Anastasia tiene 75 años de edad y es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y muy responsable y comenta que con ella nada mas vive un hijo ya que casi todos son casados y él le ayuda a vender frutas y legumbres en la central de abastos y en su casa, die que tiene con su negocio desde hace mas de 41 años y que está orgullosa de tener ese negocio ya que de ahí saco adelante a sus hijos ya que es viuda. Platica que a diario va a la central de abastos a comprar la fruta para más tarde venderla en su casa y abeces en el mercado de una población cercana a la de ella. Dice que está pidiendo un crédito para la compra de chiles manzanos, cilantro, aguacate, rábanos, chicharos, habas, lentejas, duraznos, guayabas y demás frutas de temporada,  dice que uno de sus sueños es poder tener un local estable en su casa ya que por su edad se cansa mucho de andar con las cubetas llenas de fruta y a ella le gustaría poner una tienda de abarrotes y también vender frutas de temporada. Ella dice “gracias a la financiera mi negocio ha crecido poco a poco”. Las otras once integrantes del grupo se llaman Angelina, Rosalba, Emilia, Brenda, Alondra, Juana, Blanca, Maria Santos, Yolanda, Maria Cristina y Alicia ellas invertirán sus créditos en frutas y legumbres de temporada, artículos de abarrotes para surtir su tienda, cosméticos y perfumería para vender, zapatos y ropa por catalogo para vender, material para construcción para venderlo.
texts.en:
Anastasia is 75 years old and an enterprising, hardworking, and very responsible woman. She says that only one son lives with her now that almost all of them are married, and he helps her to sell fruits and legumes in the marketplace and in her home. She says she has had her business for more than 41 years, and that she is proud to have this business since this is how she got her children ahead since she is a widow.

She tells us that she goes to the marketplace daily to buy fruit to later sell from her home, and sometimes in the market of a town near her own. She says she is asking for a loan to buy manzano chiles, cilantro, avocados, radishes, peas, fava beans, lentils, peaches, guavas, and other seasonal fruits. She says one of her dreams to have a permanent store in her home because at her age she gets very tired walking with pails full of fruit, and she would like to set up a general store and also sell seasonal fruit.

She says, "Thanks to the financing my business has grown little by little." The other eleven members of the group are Angelina, Rosalba, Emilia, Brenda, Alondra, Juana, Blanca, Maria Santos, Yolanda, Maria Cristina, and Alicia. They invest their loans in seasonal fruit and legumes, basic necessities for supplying the home, cosmetics and perfume for resale, shoes and clothing by catalog order to sell, and building materials to sell.

loans.use: to sell fruit such as manzano peppers, cilantro, avocado, radishes, peas, fava beans, lentils, peaches, guavas, and other seasonal fruits.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
MARIA ELENA tiene 26 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en San Miguel Provincia de Bolivar.

MARIA ELENA es empleada privada. Solicita el crédito para comprar una cama, un colchon, un armario. Con la ayuda del crédito podra mejorar el estilo de vida.

Las compras lo realizará en San Miguel. El sueño es poder comprarse un vehículo. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es tener estabilidad laboral.

En el tiempo libre le gusta estudiar.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is 26 years old, single, with no children and lives with her parents in San Miguel in the Bolivar Province.

Maria Elena is privately employed. She is asking for a loan in order to buy a bed and mattress, and a wardrobe. The loan will help her to improve her standard of life. 

The purchases will be made in San Miguel. Her dream is to be able to buy a car. The challenges that she faces is having job security.

In her free time she likes to study.

loans.use: to buy a bed and mattress and a wardrobe

loans.name: Kanimjon

texts.ru: Канимжон, умная,ответственная, пунктуальная женщина в возрасте 54 лет. Замужем , имеет 3 детей. С 2001 года занимается купле продажи скота и дополнительно дома сама изготавливает кисломолочные продукты и реализует в продовольственном рынке.В этом ей помогают ее дети.На полученный кредит и на копленные деньги она хочет купить одну дойную  корову.Канимжон с 2007 года кредитуется в нашей организации, ни разу не имела случаев просрочек и надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Kanimjon is a bright, responsible, and punctual fifty-four-year-old woman.  She's married and has three children.  She has been buying and selling livestock since 2001.  She also produces her own milk products at home and sells them at the market.  Her children help her out.  She would like to use her loan and her savings to buy a milk cow.  Kanimjon has been receiving loans from our organization since 2007; she's never once had a late payment and she's looking forward to your support.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Erdenebold

texts.en:
Mr. Erdenebold, 49, has a taxi business. He has been running his business for 8 years nonstop. Currently, it is a main income source for his family.  Before, he used to work as a driver in a private company. He lives with his wife and his children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife is a doctor, but she has been unemployed for a long time. 

Mr. Erdenebold spends the whole day for his business and he earns approx. 12-18 USD in a day with his old and bad car. But his business earnings do not usually meet with his family necessities, so he decided to change his taxi car with a better one. It was a little bit expensive for him, but his business will improve. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to cover some costs of his purchasing a new car. In addition, he really hopes that his business will be improved with the new car.

loans.use: To cover some costs of his purchasing a new car.

loans.name: Rakhima

texts.ru:
Рахиме 36 лет, замужем, воспитала 3 детей. Рахима работает продавцом в магазине и в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, с 1995 года занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний  день в хозяйстве Рахимы имеется  2 бычка, 7 лошадей и 1,20 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль и картофель. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рахима обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку бычков на откорм.  Доходы от кредита Рахима планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства, за счет покупки земельного надела.
texts.en:
Rakhima is 36 years old, she has raised 3 children. She works as a sales clerk in a store. To provide a source of additional income for her family, Rakhima has been farming and raising livestock since 1995, having started her business with a sum of 20,000 som (KGS). Presently, her farm has 2 calves and 7 horses, as well as 1.20 hectares of land where she grows beans and potatoes.

In order to continue developing her business, Rakhima has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves for fattening and resale. She plans to invest her profits from this loan into further expansion of her business by purchasing an additional plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Tulkun

texts.ru: Тулкин мужчина в возрасте 62 лет.Женат имеет троих детей.Он добросовестный и честный человек.Тулкин живет в Дж. Расуловском районе, работает массажистом.Он принимает поциентов на дому потому что дома имеет массажную комнату . Так как его кухня нуждается в обнавлении он решил сделать там ремонт,но даход массажиста недостаточен для покупки строительных материалов поэтому он решил обратится в нашу организацию.На полученный кредит он хочет закупить несколько мешков цемента.Заранее благодарен за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Tulkun is sixty-two and married with three children.  He's a conscientious and honorable man.  He lives in the Jabbor-Rasulov region and works as a massage therapist.  He has a massage parlor so he works on clients in his home.  His kitchen needs to be renovated to he decided get it done. However, a massage therapist's salary isn't sufficient to buy construction materials so he decided  to approach our organization.  He wants to use his loan to buy some bags of cement.  He is thankful in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase cement.

loans.name: Francisca Miriam

texts.es:
Francisca, solicita un nuevo préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, comprara medicina orgánica y química  para surtir y poder ofrecerle a los clientes mayor variedad, teniendo sus inventarios con la medicina que es más demandada y con más oportunidades de venta. 
Ella manifiesta haber mejorado su condición en el negocio con el aporte del préstamo anterior, ya que sus ventas fueron buenas y le dejaron un margen de ganancia, para contribuir con las obligaciones familiares.
texts.en:
Francisca is asking for a new loan to continue investing in her business. She will buy natural and chemical-based medicines so that she can offer her clients a wider variety, making sure that she has in her inventory the medicines that are in the highest demand and are most likely to sell. 

She says she that the last loan helped her to improve her business, since the sales were good and gave her a profit margin which allowed her to contribute towards her family obligations.

loans.use: to buy natural and chemical-based medicines

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El señor Miguel Angel es un señor trabajador y humilde y trabajador, originario de San Sebastián Ixcapa una de sus artesanías son los bordados y tejidos de mano, alfarería  en pequeña  escala, ollas, comales, cazuelas, jarros y hornos para coser pan.
Una de sus danzas son la danza de los diablos, las mascaritas.los vaqueros, toro de petateo.
El señor Miguel, como mejor lo conocen, nos dice que se dedica a la venta de refrescos, desde hace un años le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias y por que en su comunidad no hay deposito de refrescos para comprarlo a mayoreo.
Esta felizmente casado con la señora Lizbeth con quien tiene cuatro hijas Cielo, Ofelia, Violeta y Milagros quienes le ayudan a atender su deposito de refrescos.
Nos cuenta que inicio su negocio comprando poco refresco y con las ganancias y a ayuda de su esposa fueron comprando  un poco más, hasta lograr vender por mayoreo.
Él pidió el crédito para la compra de más refrescos para la venta para la venta por mayoreo.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por el apoyo que les brinda  a todas las personas con deseos de engrandecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Miguel Angel is a hardworking humble man. He is originally from San Sebastián Ixcapa. Some of their crafts are hand embroidered fabrics, small-scale pottery, pots, griddles, casseroles, pitchers, and ovens to make bread.

Some of the dances are the Dance of the Devils, the Masks, the Cowboys, and the Dancing Straw Bulls.

Miguel, as he is called, tells us that he has worked selling soft drinks for some years and he likes the business very much because he makes a good profit and because in his community there is no soft drink warehouse from which to buy at wholesale.

He is happily married to Lizbeth and they have four children called Cielo, Ofelia, Violeta and Milagros who help him in his soft drink business. He tells us that he began his business by buying a few drinks and with the earnings and the help of his wife he was buying a little more, until he was successfully selling as a wholesaler .

He has requested a loan in order to buy more soft drinks to sell at wholesale.

He gives thanks to the foundation for the help given to all the people who want to grow their businesses.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Gioconda Del Carmen

texts.es: Gioconda esta emprendedora es soltera de 33 años de edad con un hijo menor de edad, su actividad es una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación. Ella tiene  10 años que se dedica a este negocio, Ella inicio con este negocio buscando una  forma de obtener ingresos para su hijo que es lo más importante, gracias al  apoyo que fundación le ha brindado es que ha podido sacar el negocio adelante invirtiendo capital de trabajo en el mismo, está solicitando el refinanciamiento para  la compra de  productos de consumo diarios  para el hogar como: Azúcar. Pan, Arroz, Frijoles, Aceite, vegetales, harina,  sal, huevos, entre otros,   Su deseo es mejorar su nivel de vida y de su hijo.
texts.en:
Gioconda is an enterprising single woman who is 33 years of age and has a young son. She operates a general store from her own home.  Gioconda has been in this business for 10 years. She began the business while searching for a form of obtaining an income to support her son, which is most important to her. Thanks to the help offered by this foundation, Gioconda has been able to advance the business, by investments of working capital.

Gioconda is requesting financing for the purchase of products of daily consumption in the home, such as sugar, bread, rice, beans, oil, vegetables, flour, salt, and eggs, among others. Her desire is to improve the standard of living of herself and her son.

loans.use: buy sugar, bread, rice, beans, oil, vegetables, flour, salt, and eggs, among other merchandise, to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of Ready-To-Wear clothing from NATASHA and AVON

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is a woman with two children and married to a driver. Both of her children are in school. She has been selling cashew nuts at the market for the past three years. Seasonality of the product is her major challenge. Asha lives in her own house that has electricity but no piped water. Her dream is to open a wholesale business in future. 

With the loan of Ksh 20,000, she plans to purchase more stock of cashew nuts for sale.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of cashew nuts for sale.

loans.name: Ines Cordero

texts.es:
